channel.title: [PI] Please help: Quest Tab, and teleports [click&anwser]
channel.description:
1) in my quest tab i click on "save game" and i look at the cmd and i go on clickingbuttons, actionhandler, client.java and they don't have the case: 113234 <--Actionbutton when i click save game.
I want to remove all that, i know in client.java you remove the words but i want to make quests and when i click the quest interface shows up..
2) In my magic speellbook, i removed the monster teleport and changed it to "VARROCK TELEPORT" which you need runes too teleport their but how do i change the "monster teleport" name whn i hover over it?
Hopefully you guys understand me... revision:562 client type: InsidiaX <- ik it sucks... (but i will make a 2010 remake)
